A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Most disappointment i have had watching a SW film to date...Like Mark Hamill said...I fundamentally disagree with every choice tht was written for Luke in this movie.....While i would have given TFA a solid 4/5 stars even though maybe had a little too much in common with a new hope....it respected the franchise...it was like a film by a fan for the fans.....this was just a mess from start to finish....horrible choices for Luke....flying Leia....ill timed comedic moments....Finn and Rose and no romantic chemistry tht plotline made me cringe....JJ made a solid film with episode 7 and Rhian took a dump all over it...episode 7 left me with nostalgia\,hope.excitement for for things to come...this one left me sad...just sad...And feeling really sorry for Mark Hamill...And JJ Abrams.this movie was not what Mark or the die-hard fans deserve....Good luck JJ with ep9 u will need it.
